newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT-Wonderware raised to buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Wonderware raised to buy.

text.p: -- Hambrecht & Quist analyst Doug van Dorsten raised his recommendation on Wonderware Corp to buy from hold based on new products and aggressive product bundling strategies which he said position the company well for growth in 1997.
-- raised his fiscal 1997 earnings per share estimate to $0.42 from $0.37, adding that the improvement will likely come in the June 1997 and later quarters.
-- said the company will likely post a smaller operating loss in its March quarter than in its December quarter.
-- shares of Wonderware were 1/2 higher at 11-1/2 in afternoon trading on Nasdaq.
